statements: SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings;
SELECT painting_name, painter_name FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT id, deadline, client_specifications FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE painter_name='Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT painter_name, status FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE deadline < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings ORDER BY status DESC, deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status='In Progress' ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, painting_name, painter_name FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' AND status='Pending' ORDER BY painter_name, deadline;
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE client_specifications ILIKE '%portrait%' ORDER BY painter_name ASC, deadline DESC;
SELECT id, painter_name, client_specifications FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status='Completed' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT painter_name, status, deadline FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE deadline < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY status, painter_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings;
SELECT painting_id, status FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE client_specifications LIKE '%portrait%';
SELECT p.painting_id, p.status, pp.completion_date FROM commissioned_paintings p JOIN painting_progress pp ON p.painting_id = pp.painting_id;
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT painting_id, deadline FROM commissioned_paintings ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM painting_progress WHERE completion_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT painting_id, client_specifications FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status = 'Completed' LIMIT 3;
SELECT painting_id, current_status, remarks FROM painting_progress WHERE current_status = 'On Hold' ORDER BY progress_id ASC;
SELECT id, painting_name, deadline FROM commissioned_paintings;
SELECT status, painting_name, deadline FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT client_name, address, phone_number FROM clients WHERE id=1;
SELECT id, status_name FROM painting_status WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE client_id=2 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings;
SELECT painting_name, status FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT painting_name, client_id FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT client_name, address, phone_number FROM clients WHERE id IN (SELECT client_id FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status = 'Completed');
SELECT p.painting_name, ps.status_name FROM commissioned_paintings p JOIN painting_status ps ON p.status = ps.id;
SELECT * FROM paintings;
SELECT id, status, deadline FROM paintings WHERE status='in progress';
SELECT client_name, deadline FROM paintings WHERE deadline > '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, style FROM artists WHERE location='Paris';
SELECT paintings.id, paintings.client_name, progress.in_progress FROM paintings JOIN progress ON paintings.id = progress.painting_id WHERE paintings.status = 'In Progress';

SELECT artists.name, paintings.client_name, progress.completed_date FROM artists JOIN paintings ON artists.id = paintings.id JOIN progress ON paintings.id = progress.painting_id ORDER BY progress.completed_date DESC;

SELECT clients.name AS client, COUNT(paintings.id) AS number_of_paintings FROM clients LEFT JOIN paintings ON clients.id = paintings.id GROUP BY clients.name HAVING COUNT(paintings.id) > 0 ORDER BY number_of_paintings DESC;

SELECT artists.name, paintings.client_name, progress.in_progress, progress.notes FROM artists JOIN paintings ON artists.id = paintings.id JOIN progress ON paintings.id = progress.painting_id WHERE progress.notes IS NOT NULL AND progress.in_progress = 'TRUE';

SELECT paintings.client_name, progress.in_progress, progress.completed_date FROM paintings LEFT JOIN progress ON paintings.id = progress.painting_id WHERE deadline < DATE '2022-01-01' ORDER BY progress.completed_date;
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings;
SELECT artist_name, status, client_name FROM commissioned_paintings;
SELECT painting_id, canvas_size FROM painting_details;
SELECT * FROM painting_details WHERE paint_type='oil';
SELECT artist_name, style FROM artist_portfolio ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM commissioned_paintings ORDER BY deadline DESC, artist_name ASC
SELECT painting_id, artist_name, status, client_name FROM commissioned_paintings WHERE status = 'In Progress'
SELECT c.painting_id, c.artist_name, p.canvas_size, p.paint_type FROM commissioned_paintings c INNER JOIN painting_details p ON c.painting_id = p.painting_id
SELECT c.artist_name, h.previous_status, h.new_status, h.date_changed FROM commissioned_paintings c INNER JOIN painting_history h ON c.painting_id = h.painting_id
SELECT a.artist_name, a.style, a.years_of_experience, c.client_name FROM artist_portfolio a INNER JOIN commissioned_paintings c ON a.artist_name = c.artist_name
